title: LMT Surgical – Life Movement Technology
description: Contact Us. LIFE MOVEMENT TECHNOLOGY. View Products. SERVING YOUR. Across 8 surgical specialties, LMT Surgical takes pride. in distributing a product ...
header_text: Facilitating tendon repair without dictating your method.
Taking the pain out of local anaesthetic delivery.
Left & right specific plates in a simple, compact set.
Suitable for both MCP & PIP joint replacements.
External fixation, distraction & reduction of small bones.
The safe & easy way to achieve haemostasis on digits.
Contributing to correction & stabilisation of the thoracic, lumbar & sacral spine.
Acromio-clavicular ligament replacement with 1730N of tensile strength.
paragraph_text: We are available 24/7. Our friendly customer service team are always ready to assist you.
For Durolane orders, we do recommend calling within business hours.
provides stand-alone intervertebral fusion assistance in the cervical spine.
has been designed to make a large footprint implant through a small access channel approach possible.
The Flexor Tendon Repair Tools from Toby Orthopaedics provide you with the right tools for the job.
provides a time-saving & efficient alternative to suturing anastomoses.
provides surgeons & physicians with a simple-to-use solution to delivery of anaesthetic to the hamstring donor site during knee ligament reconstruction.
from Skeletal Dynamics provides a dual-headed option for volar distal radius fixation procedures.
from Toby Orthopaedics combines Post Screw & Cross Element technology to provide a stable, strong construct.
provide strong, malleable & atraumatic clips for microsurgery.
system from Skeletal Dynamics allows a total internal solution for unstable elbow fixation procedures.
The Skeletal Dynamics Protean Radial Head Plate provides a low-profile, in-situ plate for treating radial head fractures.
provides safe & effective management of symptomatic nerve-end neuroma.
uses high tear resistant, implant-grade silicone to provide a proven solution for finger joint replacement surgery.
reduces time & cost while increasing efficiency on the operating table. An ultrasonic bone cutting device that spares soft tissue makes spine & neuro surgery safer & more efficient.
provides a thin, strong layer of tissue protection, suitable in a range of applications.
Neurolac is a synthetic nerve sheath, used to assist in peripheral nerve reconstruction.
The Osteotec Osteo-X external fixator device provides simple, ready-to-use fixation & distraction for small bones of the hand.
system provides precise soft tissue aspiration and powerful removal of osseous structures.
Blister packed & easy-to-use, these k-wires come ready for surgery with the added safety benefit of single-use sterility.
For more than 20 years, the Mar-Med
has provided efficient operating results to emergency physicians, podiatrists & hand surgeons.
The Biover clamps provide a sterile packed, disposable solution in microsurgery – eliminating concerns over pressure changes. The hilly clamp design also provides atraumatic qualities.
implant provides 6 degrees of preferred lordotic orientation, designed specifically for its unique ability to correct preoperative deformity & maintain cervical lordosis.
removes bioburden from the wound site with the help of the SharpVac ultrasonic curette, for better healing outcomes.
platform from Misonix brings your ultrasonic tools together for a more powerful, streamlined, easy-to-use surgery.
system is comprised of specialised screws and instrumentations to assist with stability during normal development of solid bony consolidation.
Posterior thoracolumbar fixation, intended for percutaneous treatment.
contains a patented weave design for superior tissue ingrowth & proven results.
patient specific rod system from Medicrea takes the stress & time out of traditional rod bending techniques.
range is a top-loading, side-connecting pedicle screw system that has been designed for a varied range of surgical procedures.
The complete range of low-profile, triangulated
plates was developed to respect the unique anatomy of each patient while providing optimal mechanical stability.
are anterior cervical spinal fixation staples that secure the position of the graft & apply compression to stimulate & accelerate bone fusion.
The Lockdown ligament is suitable for reconstructive surgery of the ankle, as well as shoulder.
